    • Player

      public Player​(java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> images, int x, int y)
      The constructor of the player class, slightly modified
      Parameters:
      images - A list of images which the character will use as sort of "animations"
      x - The x coordinate to spawn the player at
      y - The y coordinate to spawn the player at

      public void dash()
      A method which causes the character to dash forwards, and cause the characters to mostly ignore gravity.

    • act

      public void act​(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Shape> obstacles, long timeElapsed)
      Modified act method. Uses time elapsed so that even on slower computers the game should run relatively the same.
      Parameters:
      obstacles - The arraylist of all the obstacles on the map used for collisions.
      timeElapsed - How much time has passed since the last time the draw method in DrawingSurface was run in nanoseconds
